items.title: promptify-ai 0.1.0
items.summary: The promptify-ai 0.1.0 tool has been released, allowing users to gather files into a single prompt for easier consumption by LLM. This innovation streamlines the process of using large language models for various tasks.

items.summary: promptify-ai has been added to PyPI, allowing users to gather files into a single prompt for Language Model consumption.
